outputs.name: dir
outputs.description: A list of direct normal irradiance values at each timestep of the WEA.

outputs.name: diff
outputs.description: A list of diffuse sky solar irradiance values at each timestep of the WEA.

outputs.name: glob
outputs.description: A list of global horizontal irradiance values at each timestep of the WEA.

name: HB Deconstruct Wea
description:
Deconstruct a Wea object into lists of direct, diffuse, and golbal radiation
at each timestep of the file.
-
